original: 《 君主命令 》君主命令的數量會受到勢力的武將總數影響，武將人數越多，能派發的君主命令就越多。君主命令的上限則會受到君主個人的行動力影響，君主行動力越高，則君主命令的上限就越高。
text: "Monarch Orders" The number of monarch orders will be affected by the total number of generals in the power. The more generals there are, the more monarch orders can be issued. The upper limit of the monarch's command will be affected by the individual's action power. The higher the monarch's action power, the higher the upper limit of the monarch's command.
